text: The following lists events that happened in 1941 in Iceland. ==Incumbents== *Monarch - Kristján X *Prime Minister - Hermann Jónasson ==Events== ==Births== *2 January - Björgólfur Guðmundsson, businessman *6 January - Ingvar Elísson, footballer *17 April - Jón Sigurðsson, politician. ===Full date missing=== *Hafliði Hallgrímsson, composer ==Deaths== Ingibjörg H. Bjarnason *30 October - Ingibjörg H. Bjarnason, politician, suffragist, schoolteacher and gymnast (b. 1867) ==References== Category:1940s in Iceland Iceland Iceland Category:Years of the 20th century in Iceland
title: 1941 in Iceland
